title: Such schemes shall not be permissible on lands reserved in the Development Plan and Zone in which Residential development is not permissible
clause_text: Such schemes shall not be permissible on lands reserved in the Development Plan and Zone in which Residential development is not permissible.
section: Provision relating to Permanent Transit Camp Tenements for Slum Rehabilitation Scheme implemented on open plot / non-slum plot.
